description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the item detailed below.
full_summary:
## Cable, Electrical Tender Notice
### Reference information
* Reference Number: PW-23-01020830
* Solicitation Number: W8485-237405/A
* Publication Date: January 11, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: January 25, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* Status: Closed (Expired)

### Procurement Details
* GSIN: 6145 (Wire and Cable, Electrical)
* Description: The Department of National Defence seeks a supplier for cable, electrical (CABLE, ELECTRICAL), in accordance with MIL-DTL-32496.
* Quantity: 400 units
* Unit of Issue: MR
* Delivery: Free Carrier (FCA) Plant to 25 CFSD Montreal, Canada

### Contact and Notice Information
* Contracting Entity: Department of National Defence
* Contact Person: Duncan, Ryan
* Email: [ryan.duncan@forces.gc.ca](mailto:ryan.duncan@forces.gc.ca)
* Notice URL: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/11/fc389a47cf5a0e1eb6b0640127877ea7/w8485-237405_rfp_eng.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/11/fc389a47cf5a0e1eb6b0640127877ea7/w8485-237405_rfp_eng.pdf)
* Tender Documents: Attached in English and French

### Trade Agreements
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Regions of Opportunity
* Canada

### Procurement Method
* Competitive, open bidding

Please submit your bid in accordance with the attached documents, following the instructions provided. The deadline for submission is January 25, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST. For any inquiries, please contact Ryan Duncan at the email address listed above.  ##



*Note: the rewritten version was formatted with nice markdown format, and excluded unnecessary information. The note about contracting rights and official language of Canada were preserved as relevant information.*
